projects.title: Mooinooi Community
projects.description: A platform created to unify the community of Mooinooi by centralizing information, ensuring everyone has access to essential updates and resources in one convenient location.

projects.title: MAC-NDOWS
projects.description: A web-based operating system inspired by a meme, designed to provide users with a unique, playful interface while offering the functionality of traditional OS platforms like Windows or macOS.
